events.message: Customer reported a rear-end collision involving their car at the intersection on May 30th, 2024.
The claim was classified under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a personal vehicle in a traffic collision.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to manage the case and communicate directly with the customer.
Customer received confirmation that their automobile accident claim has been officially acknowledged.
Customer was asked to submit police reports, photographs of damage, and repair estimates for the vehicle.
All requested documents including accident report and car repair estimates were received from the customer.
The claims team initiated a detailed investigation to verify accident circumstances and liability aspects.
Investigation concluded determining the other driver’s liability and extent of vehicle damages.
A settlement offer was prepared and sent to the customer outlining the approved payout for repairs.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling of the vehicle damage claim.
Claim approval was granted after customer acceptance of the proposed settlement amount.
The settlement payment was successfully processed and credited to the customer’s bank account.
The automobile accident claim case has been closed after all payments and processes were completed.
The closed claim record was archived in the system for future reference and regulatory compliance.
